data.title: Cynthia Villar Biography, Achievements, Laws, Net Worth
data.meta_description: What you need to know about Cynthia Villar - Biography, Family, Net Worth, Education, Achievements, Advocacy, and other info
data.text:
Cynthia Villar is a Filipino businesswoman and politician. She is currently serving as one of the senators of the Philippines.

Personal Information

Complete Name –> Cynthia Ampaya Aguilar-Villar

Nickname –> Cynthia

Birth Date –> July 29, 1950 (age 72)

Hometown –> Las Pinas, Metro Manila, Philippines

Net Worth –> ₱3.87 billion (as of December 31, 2020)

Net Worth –> ₱3.8 billion (as of December 3, 2019)

Family

Husband –> Former Senate President Manny Villar

Children –> DPWH Secretary Mark Villar, Business Executive Manuel Paolo Villar, Congresswoman Camille Villar

Father –> Former Las Pinas Mayor Filemon Aguilar

Mother –> Lydia Ampaya

Brother –> Former Las Pinas Mayor Vergel Aguilar

Education

Elementary –> Muntinlupa Elementary School

High School –> Philippine Christian University

College –> University of the Philippines

Degree –> Bachelor of Science in Business Administration

Masters –> New York University

Degree –> Business Administration (MBA)

Political Career / Work Experiences

2013-Present – Senator

2001-2010 – Congresswoman of Las Pinas

Laws / Bills / Resolutions

Advocacies
